thread.section_title: Move on 24 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Move on 24 | moveon24.com
thread.title: Navjot

author: Navjot
title: Navjot
text:
It was a pleasant experience. I needed a cab at 7 in the morning so I called move on 24. It was easy to connect with them & booking was also done easily without asking any unnecessary questions.
I received a confirmation message from them and even reached before time which was impressive. The service was excellent from Delhi Airport to Chandigarh.Drivers were polite and well mannered.Great service. Hope you guys continue with MOVE ON 24 in future.
